# Mobile Account Protection

Learn to build stronger Mobile Account Protection in Android & iOS apps using Appdome's AI-Native mobile app defense platform — all from within your mobile CI/CD pipeline. Use Appdome to fully automate the build, testing, release, and monitoring lifecycle of Android & iOS mobile account protection defenses in mobile apps quickly. Use AI-native plugins to automate the implementation of defenses against keyloggers, overlay attacks, clipboard hijacking, SIM swapping, and more. Prevent advanced memory attacks and memory editing tools, including defenses against memory dumping. Protect the Trusted Execution Environment (TEE), including application state protection for all Android and iOS apps, and more to prevent account takeovers (ATOs).
